---
title: "Normalization"
output: html_document
date: "2025-04-23"
params:
  input_rds: "output/filtered_pbmc.rds"
  output_rds: "output/normalized_pbmc.rds"
---



```{r}
library(Seurat)

# Load the filtered PBMC object
pbmc <- readRDS(params$input_rds)

# Normalize the data
pbmc <- NormalizeData(pbmc, normalization.method = "LogNormalize", scale.factor = 10000)

head(pbmc)

# Save the normalized object
saveRDS(pbmc, file = params$output_rds)
```
